programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: The Journeyman, (2001, Western)

programme.desc: Doc Holliday runs a small dental practice in rural Georgia when he is visited by Wyatt Earp and offered a chance to become a United States Deputy. All Doc has to do is capture the Bridle Brothers – two of most notorious outlaws the West has ever seen.

programme.title: Timeline, (2003, Action)

programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive, (2006, Action)

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)

programme.title: Season of the Witch, (2011, Science fiction)

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Action)

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)

programme.title: The Matrix, (1991, Action)

programme.title: Julie & Julia, (2009, Drama)

programme.title: Maniac (2012), (2013, Horror)

programme.desc: Small-time hood Frankie the Fly teams with a porn filmmaker and porno actress to try to make a killing by running a high-risk scam of the big boss.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: In one of the greatest road movies of all time, Geena Davis and Susan Sarandon ride to everlasting fame as two women who embark on a crime spree across the American southwest.

programme.title: Mulholland Falls, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Four tough, no-nonsense and very crooked cops investigate the murder of a young woman, When they discover she was romantically linked to their boss and a prominent U.S. Army General, they try to cover up the murder.

programme.title: The Getaway, (1994, Crime)
programme.desc: An ex-con and his devoted wife must flee from danger when a heist doesn't go as planned.

programme.title: Kill Me Again, (1989, Thriller)
programme.desc: Private investigator Val Kilmer is looking to score some quick cash. Joanne Whalley-Kilmer is the femme fatale who just wants to disappear. Michael Madsen is her psychotic boyfriend. Fate will bring them all together in this clever, modern-day noir.

programme.title: Crash and Burn, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Michael Madsen ("Reservoir Dogs") stars as a car thief, known as a chopper, in this raw, authentic and fast-paced thriller that brakes for no one.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Cop Land, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Director James Mangold (FORD vs FERRARI) extends his crime thriller classic that brings together a powerhouse cast, including Robert De Niro, Sylvester Stallone, Ray Liotta, and Harvey Keitel.

programme.title: The Fan, (1996, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: When the San Francisco Giants pay centerfielder Bobby Rayburn (Wesley Snipes) $40 million to lead their team to the World Series, no one is happier or more supportive than #1 fan Gil Renard (Robert De Niro). Rating: R

programme.title: In the Line of Fire, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gripping, gut-wrenching thriller that delivers suspense in almost unbearable doses, IN THE LINE OF FIRE showcases Clint Eastwood at his finest. In a performance that won universal acclaim, Eastwood stars as Frank Horrigan. Rated: R

programme.title: Cop Land, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Director James Mangold (FORD vs FERRARI) extends his crime thriller classic that brings together a powerhouse cast, including Robert De Niro, Sylvester Stallone, Ray Liotta, and Harvey Keitel.

programme.title: First Knight, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Together, Sean Connery, Richard Gere, Julia Ormond (Legends of the Fall, Sabrina) and Jerry Zucker, the director of Ghost, bring you a new vision of King Arthur's Camelot.

programme.title: The Fisher King, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Parry, a homeless history professor, lives in a fantasy world full of castles, Red Knights and damsels in distress. Bridges co-stars as Jack, New York's #1 shock deejay, whose off-hand arrogance triggers a tragedy which ruins his career. Rated: R

programme.title: Cop Land, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Director James Mangold (FORD vs FERRARI) extends his crime thriller classic that brings together a powerhouse cast, including Robert De Niro, Sylvester Stallone, Ray Liotta, and Harvey Keitel.

programme.title: Good Guys Wear Black, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Chuck Norris stars as John T. Booker, the former leader of an elite commando unit who must uncover the reason why his former squad members are being systematically murdered one by one. Anne Archer and James Franciscus co-star.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Walking Tall, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Walking Tall, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Hoping to save his friends from the clutches of Sector Security, Yusei Fudo challenges his old nemesis Officer Trudge to a Turbo Duel!
programme.sub-title: On Your Mark, Get Set, DUEL!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his Duel Runner on the line, Yusei finds himself dueling against a bully who battles with a deck full of bugs.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Looking to get his Stardust Dragon card back from Jack Atlas, Yusei takes off in a race against time and Sector Security.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After making it through to New Domino City, Yusei confronts his old friend Jack Atlas and challenges him to a Turbo Duel.
programme.sub-title: A Blast from the Past, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the clash between Jack and Yusei comes to a climatic close, a mysterious creature appears as their two Dragons duke it out.
programme.sub-title: A Blast from the Past, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being sent to The Facility, Yusei befriends an odd old man who duels with a treasure deck full of ancient mystic cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei duels the top dog at The Facility using Yanagi's treasure deck. Meanwhile, Jack learns about the mystery surrounding his Mark of the Crimson Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Yusei still serving out his sentence at The Facility, Jack finds himself having to face off against former Turbo Duel Champion Hunter Pace in a rematch that could send Jack's career up in smoke.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being sent to the Maximum Security Zone in The Facility, Yusei risks being permanently placed in lockdown when he decides to duel Chief Armstrong in order to win a pardon for his pal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the clash between Yusei and the Chief comes to a shocking conclusion, Yusei must figure out a way to win the battle before his life points get zapped to zero.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being freed from the Facility, Yusei risks being re-incarcerated when he tries to take back his Duel Runner from Sector Security's vault.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Officer Trudge in hot pursuit, Yusei looks to rev his game up before the long arm of the law grabs a hold of him for good!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Yusei can't remember his own name, he agrees to duel a pint-sized player named Leo in the hopes of getting his memory back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As Leo and his pal Dexter venture into the narrows of New Domino City to find the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose, Blister breaks out a plan to keep Yusei's friends in the Satellite Sector safe from Goodwin's goons.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The stage is set for the Fortune Cup as eight elite duelists vie for the chance to take on reigning champion Jack Atlas. However, for the Master of Ceremonies Rex Goodwin, it's not about who wins or loses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The second duel of the Fortune Cup is about to get under way as the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose finds herself having to face off against a medieval menace named Sir Randsborg.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the first Turbo Duel of the Fortune Cup set to start, a surprise guest forces Yusei's competition to take an unexpected pit stop.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Director Goodwin enlists the hypnotic powers of the Professor to expose Luna as a Signer and uncover the secrets she unknowingly knows of the Duel Monsters Spirit World.
programme.sub-title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between the Professor and Luna continues, Luna looks to keep a promise she made to protect the Duel Monsters Spirit World, but in order for her to succeed, she must first break free of the hypnotic hold the Professor has on her.
programme.sub-title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The semifinals of the Fortune Cup are about to begin, and the first match of day two features Yusei going toe-to-toe with the tower of power - Greiger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With no cards left in his hand and his life points about to get blasted by Greiger, Yusei has one draw left to take down this tower of power to keep in the hunt to duel Jack in the championship round.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In the second battle of the semifinals, Akiza squares off against the professional profiler Commander Koda, but with her tournament life on the line, can Akiza outplay an opponent who claims to know her every move?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the Fortune Cup Finale one win away, Yusei and Akiza get set to battle it out as Director Goodwin anxiously awaits the final Signer to reveal their Mark of the Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the back-and-forth battle between Akiza and Yusei rages on, Yusei is forced to unleash his mighty Stardust Dragon in order to stop Akiza's grisly garden from squeezing his life points into submission.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the Fortune Cup Finale about to kick into overdrive, Jack decides to clear the air and reveal the truth behind his escape from the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the finish line of the Fortune Cup fast approaching, Yusei and Jack find themselves on a collision course with destiny as they race to unlock the mystery behind the Crimson Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After defeating Jack to win the Fortune Cup Finale, Yusei is challenged to a Shadow Duel by an underground duelist whose mind has been taken over by the Dark Signers.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and his robed rival rages on, Yusei must rely on his deck if he plans to survive this Shadow Duel and uncover the truth behind the Dark Signers sinister scheme to destroy the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After agreeing to help Yusei meet with Director Goodwin, Officer Trudge unknowingly becomes one of the Dark Signers' drones and challenges a wounded Jack Atlas to a Shadow Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Hoping to gain Yusei's trust, Director Goodwin decides to share with him the secrets behind the origin of the Satellite Sector and the ongoing war between Signer and Dark Signer.

programme.title: Sanji tries his best to save himself and his captain, Luffy! But the arrival of Germa has complicated matters. Whose side do these powerful superhumans fight on? In the end, sisterly love will see Sanji saved!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pulling Back from the Brink! The Formidable Reinforcements – Germa!

programme.title: Luffy and Sanji are safe! But the critical moment approaches - the fate of Totto Land rests on the taste of the wedding cake! Will it be sweet release or bitter defeat? Meanwhile, a cunning pincer attack leaves the Straw Hats hopelessly trapped.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last Hope! The Sun Pirates Emerge!

programme.title: With the help of the Sun Pirates, the Straw Hats see their chance to escape! And the Sun Pirates bid farewell to their former captain. Mama finally tastes the Wedding Cake and the results are positively scrumptious!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Captivating Flavor! Sanji's Cake of Happiness!

programme.title: The Big Mom Pirates fooled! The Straw Hats have eluded their would-be tormentors with the help of the Sun Pirates! However, as the fleet of the Big Mom Pirates is still coming after them, Jimbei makes a crucial decision to help the Sunny to get away.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man of Humanity and Justice! Jimbei, a Desperate Massive Ocean Current!

programme.title: At a great cost of energy and life, the Straw Hats make it out of Totto Land. Left behind in their wake are allies and friends, and would-be lovers. As the sea opens before them, what price has been paid for their escape?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Parting Time! Pudding's Last Wish!

programme.title: Luffy's recent exploits make their way around the world! The reputation of this mighty pirate begins to grow as all eyes look towards the Straw Hats' next move! Also - German 66 leaves an artifact behind which excites the crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The World is Stunned! The Fifth Emperor of the Sea Emerges!

programme.title: As the royals make their way to the Reverie, the mighty Navy takes all precautions to make sure they don't fall prey to kidnappings! At the vanguard is Koby, who glimpses Luffy's exploits and remembers their shared past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! The Straw Hats' Sworn Allies Come Together!

programme.title: A vicious pirate group led by Pinkbeard who describes himself as one of Blackbeard's affiliates attacks a town in the Kingdom of Lulucia while their king and able-bodied soldiers have gone to the Reverie. And four bizarre individuals come to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sabo Goes into Action! All the Captains of the Revolutionary Army Appear!

programme.title: At New Marineford, Sakazuki, the new Admiral of the Fleet, hears the news about Luffy and recalls the tumultuous Paramount War that haunts the Navy! That game-changing war has repercussions that last into the present!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Going into Action! The Implacable New Admiral of the Fleet - Sakazuki!

programme.title: Nobles from around the world gather for the Reverie as the echoes of the Paramount War resound! Among them are Shirahoshi and her family from the Ryugu Kingdom under the sea. Meanwhile, Admiral Fujitora has a conversation with his new colleague.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Paramount War! The Inherited Will of the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Stelly, Sabo's adopted brother and now the king of the Goa Kingdom, walks up to Garp who is escorting the royal family of the Fish-Man Island, with an air of importance and something up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Step Forward for Her Dream! Shirahoshi Goes Out in the Sun!

programme.title: Shirahoshi and her family finally reach the Holyland of Mariejois! But all the unexpected attention confuses her. Meanwhile, Vivi from Alabasta meets Leo and Rebecca from Dressrosa, and tells them the story of her journey with the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca's Sentiments!

programme.title: Vivi reunites with Dalton and Dr. Kureha from the Sakura Kingdom and they share their memories of the Straw Hats with Shirahoshi and Rebecca. Meanwhile, a shadowy figure descends a long staircase at the castle in the Holyland and opens a mysterious door.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: In the Dark Recesses of the Holyland! A Mysterious Giant Straw Hat!

programme.title: Shirahoshi crosses the fancy of a Celestial Dragon, and those living gods are not open to having their whims disobeyed! As she is dragged away, King Neptune comes to her rescue, risking life and limb by defying the Celestial Dragon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Holyland in Tumult! The Targeted Princess Shirahoshi!

programme.title: The Emperors of the Sea, Big Mom and Kaido decide to team up against Luffy! Meanwhile, Garp hears about the wild exploits of his grandson, all while a mysterious outsider visits the highest authority in the world!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Explosive Situation! Two Emperors of the Sea Going After Luffy!

programme.title: After sneaking into the Land of the Gods, Sabo sees the shocking figure of his friend – Kuma! Abused by the World Government as a pawn in their games, Kuma, who was made an example of what happens when you disobey the gods!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sabo Enraged! The Tragedy of the Revolutionary Army Officer Kuma!

programme.title: The Reverie has begun! The representative kings and queens first discuss what to do with Straw Hat Luffy. Meanwhile the Revolutionary Army confirms its desire to save Kuma! All while they recount how the Straw Hats have grown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally, It Starts! The Conspiracy-filled Reverie!

programme.title: In order to recruit a strong ally towards bringing down Kaido, Cat Viper and his crew stop by Whitebeard's homeland to see Marco, the 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Marco! The Keeper of Whitebeard's Last Memento!

programme.title: Luffy and the others become excited as they see familiar faces in a newspaper article about the Reverie while they close in on the Land of Wano. But this dangerous and foreboding land is as inaccessible as it is mysterious! The sea itself is a barrier!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Climbing Up a Waterfall! A Great Journey Through the Land of Wano's Sea Zone!

programme.title: A mysterious country, a rampaging slasher, ancient samurai rituals of seppuku - and Zoro in the crosshairs! When a street assault occurs, all signs point to Zoro! Meanwhile, Luffy finally arrives at the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Land of Wano! To the Samurai Country where Cherry Blossoms Flutter!

programme.title: Stranded alone on the beach, Luffy tries to gather his bearings only to be confronted by some mysterious, and dangerous, local fauna! And then, he meets a little girl named Otama! Meanwhile, Zoro makes trouble for the others who are trying to blend in!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido's Army!

programme.title: Otama's gratitude towards Luffy knows no bounds! But the feast she cooks him exhausts her food stores completely! As she suffers from poor drinking water, her companion tells the story of the mysterious outsider she waits for - Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: He'll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!

programme.title: Ambushed and outgunned by a skilled bounty hunter Cidre's group, the Straw Hats rely on the Sunny's Coup de Burst to escape! But they end up stranded without cola! A nearby soda island offers a solution.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Side Story! The World's Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!

programme.title: Luffy and Boa Hancock square off against the Cidre Guild! These unscrupulous bounty hunters have one thing in mind - profit at any cost! When the battle looks won, Cidre gears up in a menacing power suit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!

programme.title: Otama recounts her promise to Ace while Luffy rushes her to medical attention. But just as they reach the wasteland, a familiar face comes into view! But Kaido's underlings show up too!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding through the Wasteland!

programme.title: Otama's temperature is going up and Luffy has no time to waste! However, Hawkins, one of Kaido's Headliners, blocks their way by showing his unique powers and skills which can harm his own men.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Headliner! Hawkins the Magician Appears!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro have been stalled by Hawkins but their fortune looks bright as they are guided by a woman who Zoro had saved. She leads them to a teahouse and to an herbal remedy for the river poison.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defeat is Inevitable! The Strawman's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: Otama's life is saved by Otsuru at her teahouse. The proud Otama finds it hard to take more kindness. The group learns of the Okobore Town - living on the cast-offs of the officials! Then, suddenly, they were attacked by the Shogun's men!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!

programme.title: Otama has been kidnapped by the Gifters! She is taken to a flourishing town called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking Headliner was expecting her. Luffy and Zoro rush to rescue her along with a samurai, Okiku!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Charging into the Enemy's Territory! Bakura Town - Where Officials Thrive!

programme.title: As Luffy, Zoro, and Okiku bounce through Bakura Town on Komachiyo's back, a sumo wrestler comes flying towards them! Interested, they go down to watch sumo but the undefeated yokozuna Urashima has been expecting Okiku there.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!

programme.title: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in the Land of Wano, to a sumo match! Urashima even uses illegal moves to beat Luffy at any cost! Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he knows she committed a crime and he has to punish her for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!

programme.title: After sending the yokozuna Urashima flying, Luffy and his clan continue their search for Bakura Town's boss to save Otama! They finally find the boss, Holdem, one of the Beast Pirates' Headliners.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!

programme.title: Facing Holdem who is holding Otama as hostage, Luffy prepares for a fight but Okiku tries to stop him by sharing who is really ruling the region. Meanwhile, Basil Hawkins is confronted by a mysterious figure.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Orion's Crown has been stolen and is up for grabs at a black-market auction. Lupin has his eyes on both the crown and the auction money, but first he must outsmart the other parties vying for the crown, including Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A two-thousand-year-old casket has been excavated. Inside the casket is Camilla, a beautiful woman in a near-death state, holding a golden statuette of the Virgin Mary. Lupin attempts to steal the golden statuette, but things don't go as planned…
programme.sub-title: Lupin Who Turned into a Vampire

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are attending a party in Africa, waiting for an opportunity to snatch a rare black pearl. However, their plan goes awry when a gang of gorillas crashes the party and steals the black pearl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Massive riches have been hidden inside Tsukikage Castle. Lupin and his gang must decipher a code to find out the whereabouts of this great treasure. Wii Lupin be able to locate the treasure before his rivals do?
programme.sub-title: Uncover the Secret of Tsukikage Castle

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen head to Mongolia in search of Genghis Khan's treasures. Meanwhile, Goemon is visiting his ancestor's grave to pay his respects when he encounters Fujiko, who is in search of Yoshitsune Minamoto's buried treasure.
programme.sub-title: The Hidden Gold of Genghis Khan

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO chief promises to erase Fujiko's criminal record in exchange for her cooperation in arresting Lupin. Up against an ego-bruised Inspector Zenigata and a determined Fujiko, have Lupin's heisting days come to an end?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen sneak on board a ship smuggling diamonds. However, what they find on board are several thousand chickens! Lupin and his gang infiltrate the Hong Kong smuggling boss's lair where diamonds are being illicitly sold…
programme.sub-title: Diamonds Disappeared Under the Sky of Hong Kong

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal a suitcase containing Costa Rican diamonds, but the contents turns out to be Inspector Zenigata. The real diamonds are being shipped to Puerto Rico inside a missile and Lupin must find out the precise launch time to intercept it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaguya, a beautiful woman, separately asks Lupin, Jigen and Goemon to gather the tears of the Yeti, a mermaid's scale, and the liver of a dragon so she can make a secret potion.
programme.sub-title: Search for the Treasure of Princess Kaguya

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A wealthy shipping magnate and also a bachelor, Onabes' final voyage is nothing short of extravagant, with a ship full of beautiful women and fine art. Things go as planned when Lupin infiltrates the ship disguised as a woman…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Hong Kong for a vacation when he is asked to find a woman in return for helping him escape from Inspector Zenigata. Lupin discovers the pickpocket who stole his wallet is the daughter of the woman he is looking for…
programme.sub-title: Where are the Peking Man's Bones?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Sleeping Lion, a statue made of solid gold, is being transported to a museum by a specially armored, airtight car. Lupin steals the armored car together with the statue and nearly asphyxiated Inspector Zenigata inside.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal crime boss Mulligan's precious jewels, only have them stolen from him by Fujiko! Mulligan, unaware that Fujiko has his jewels, hires a skilled gunman named Hangman to take them back from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has been put on auction at the Wanted Club and Dr. Mad places the winning bid. Dr. Mad also purchases Fujiko and Jigen from the auctions. The three are abandoned on a deserted island with killer cyborgs.
programme.sub-title: Lupin is Available to the Highest Bidder

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has his eyes on the royal family's Imperial State Crown, but thanks to Scotland Yard's Inspector Dover, stealing it won't be easy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin announces he's going to steal the betting takes at the Kentucky Derby, but the heist fails. However, it's all part of the plan. Lupin's main target is really the Metropolitan Bank's underground vault.
programme.sub-title: Lupin Laughs at the Alarm Bell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After several divorces and a couple of deceased husbands, Jacqueline has amassed a fortune and a collection of impressive jewels. In a twist of fate, Lupin and Jacqueline become close... Too close for Jigen and Goemon's comfort…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An illicit auction selling smuggled treasures is taking place. Lupin targets the auction. In the process, Lupin discovers the auctioneer is Cornelia, the woman he once loved who died saving his life…
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is reunited with Cornelia, a woman who died by her father's hands to save Lupin's life. However, Cornelia's memories of Lupin have been erased. Her father is Dr. Zel, a Nazi who has succeeded in resurrecting corpses and controlling them.
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko discovers that the Holy Scripture for Immortality is hidden within the jungles of Thailand. However, Emmanuelle Poirot, a cold-hearted beauty, is after them too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Phantoma Mark III, grandson of the mysterious master thief and disguise artist Phantoma, who terrorized Europe during his heyday, is plotting to take over the world…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The aging Inspector Hanshichi Mikawa, who failed to capture Lupin 10 years ago, is viewed as a nuisance by his peers at the downtown police station. Lupin has announced he'll be stealing the golden Kannon statuette.
programme.sub-title: Detective Hanshichi, The Tenth Year Promise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have stolen the "36 Views of Mt. Fuji," a famous series of 46 woodblock prints, from the exhibition hall. However, a gang calling itself the Shiranami Five challenges Lupin head-on by stealing one of the prints from him.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Goemon, siding with the Shiranami Five, challenges Lupin to a one-on-one duel. While Goemon keeps Lupin busy, the Shiranami Five steals the 36 Views, but one of its members, Kikuko Benten, betrays her gang and escapes with the loot.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a wild whim, Inspector Zenigata swipes a throwing coin owned by his great Edo-era ancestor, Heiji Zenigata while he's viewing the inside of an incredible new safe protected by Professor Hunter's super computer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are after the Aurora Droplet, a diamond adorning a prima ballerina's tiara. During the heist, Jigen is wounded and in a twist of fate, is saved by Monica, the prima ballerina.
programme.sub-title: The Face of Goodbye at the National Border

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After shaking off Inspector Zenigata's pursuit, Lupin is stopped by a monstrously huge Fujiko on his way home! The giant Fujiko turns out to be an illusion created by Madame X. Lupin learns Madame X's hobby is collecting famous people.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious World of Madame X

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Bandit leader Basara is determined to sniff out the location of the diamonds Lupin has hidden somewhere in India. Armed with his sinister invention, the Suicide Ray Gun, he tries to make Lupin talk, even trying his luck with a fake Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Trouble is all but guaranteed when a crime boss and an arms merchant join hands. The two set their eyes on Goemen's sword, which can split a tank in half! After hiring Fujiko to steal it, they transform the sword into an invincible flying weapon of war.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen and Gomen have sent a letter saying they are being held captive in a small but terrifying village. Lupin arrives in the village to rescue them, but Jigen and Goemon are acting oddly.
programme.sub-title: The Sound of the Devil's Bell Calls Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Don Kecchi, the wealthiest man in America, is terminally ill and has announced that he's donating his entire fortune to charity. However, Lupin steals Kecchi's money and shoots Fujiko right in front of Inspector Zenigata!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Margaret Tiffany, the owner of Tiffany's and a TV anchor, hires Lupin and his gang to rob her jewelry store on live TV. Initially, Lupin refuses, but ends up having to go through with it thanks to Fujiko's wild spending habits.
programme.sub-title: Christmas is in the Goddess' Hands

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A princess of a small Silk Road country has been kidnapped. Lupin and his gang are persuaded to rescue Princess Yasmin in exchange for a stomach full of holy curry meant for the gods. However, the kidnapping was a trap to lure Lupin.

programme.title: Last Action Hero, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Action-adventure superstar Arnold Schwarzenegger bursts through the screen as a larger-than-life movie hero in this nonstop adventure from acclaimed director John McTiernan (Predator, Die Hard). Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Western)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Welcome to America's Wild - and very wacky - West! Burt Reynolds, Clint Walker, Ossie Davis and Angie Dickinson star in this tongue-in-cheek tale of love, lust and larceny as an amiable con-artist is hire by a sexy widow to break into the U.S. Mint.

programme.title: Rustlers' Rhapsody, (1985, Western)
programme.desc: The Wild West goes wacko when the Greatest Fast-Drawin', Silver-Spurred, Geetar Playin', Singing Cowboy movie matinee idol Rex O'Herlihan hits the saddle in Rustlers' Rhapsody, a cockeyed, affectionate send-up of the '40s B-movie Western.

programme.title: Barbarosa, (1982, Western)
programme.desc: A young cowboy hooks up with a legendary outlaw, and before long both are on the run from the law.

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the army…and each other!

programme.title: The Dark Command, (1940, Western)
programme.desc: A Civil War tale based on the exploits of the notorious outlaw William Quantrill. A courageous sheriff stands up to Quantrill and his band of guerrillas pillaging the countryside in Civil War-torn Kansas, and stops the raids.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: Rio Grande, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Lt. Col. Yorke leads his cavalry troops to the Rio Grande to fight a warring tribe. Yorke’s toughest battle lies ahead when his unorthodox plan to outwit the elusive Apaches leads to possible court-martial.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: Sobibor

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.
